Text: Get FREE Disney MoviesPST IMAGE NCI Marketing Web Alert IMAGEAndrew IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGEGet two FREE Disney movies from the Disney Movie Collection by Mail Youll get Disney favorites delivered right to your door which makes entertaining your whole family as easy as opening your mail Sign up today Youll receive your first two movies FREE when you agree to purchase at least six more over the next year at our regular prices just per VHS per DVD To select your two FREE Disney movies click the button below IMAGE Or call and mention promotion code CM Share with a friend PLUS SHIPPING AND HANDLING Product selection subject to change Please allow weeks for delivery Items may ship separately Not all titles available in DVD format and are subject to availability This offer may not be combined with any other offer coupon or rebate We reserve the right to end this promotion at any time Disney Enterprises Inc You are receiving this special offer because you have provided permission to receive third party email communications regarding special online promotions or offers If you do not wish to receive any further messages from Network Commerce please click here to unsubscribe Any thirdparty offers contained in this email are the sole responsibility of the offer originator Copyright Network Commerce Inc
